column1: Trends in prevalence rates of food insecurity and very low food security in U.S. households, 1995-2020

column2:
Food insecurity 
(includes low and very low food security)

column1: Note: Prevalence rates for 1996 and 1997 were adjusted for the estimated effects of differences in data collection screening protocols used in those years.
Source: USDA, Economic Research Service, using data from the Current Population Survey Food Security Supplement.
